author: Rob Braxman Tech
description:
As some of you realize, we can't escape Windows 100% of the time. But what if you escape it 90% of the time? If so then all the spyware crap becomes meaningless. The solution is to use Windows only when necessary for limited distribution apps, but conduct your daily life in Linux. This videos teaches you how to Dual Boot Windows and Linux.

But if you're already on Windows 11, this has become extremely complicated. So this video will ensure that you evade the minefield and be able to prevent Microsoft from screwing up your Dual Boot install.

title: Dual Boot Is Easy...Until It Isnt: Failsafe Techniques to Keep Microsoft From Screwing It Up
